Please try later Location Access Denied! You are here ! Map Product Categories product thumbnail favorites icon OOPS! You can\'t review yet! To protect our customers from Fake Product Reviews, we have decided to provide access only to customers who have purchased to products. This is to make sure our customers get unbiased genuine review of our products either good or bad and make an informed decision. Hope you understand. Please purchase the product to review :) Order ID: Puchase Date: Payment: Transaction History
MAGIZHINI SUBSCRIPTION PLAN \n\n Magizhini Subscription plan allows customers to purchase products as a subscription plan. With options to cancel subscription anytime you want and cancel product delivery on any particular dates in the subscription period. \n \n \nHOW DOES IT WORK? \n\n Once you are subscribed to a product, We will deliver you the product based on your subscription type at your doorstep \n \n \nWHAT SUBSCRIPTION PLANS DO WE OFFER? \n \n We Offers our customers to choose from Monthly Subscription, Alternate Days Subscription or Custom selected days based on customer preference. \n \n \nWHAT IS MONTHLY SUBSCRIPTION PLAN? \n \n With Monthly Subscription Plan customers will get product delivered at their doorstep for the next thirty days. At the end of Subscription period the same subscription can be renewed for the next 30 days. The Subscription can be cancelled any time and the money for product Cancelled, Not Delivered and Remaining Delivery days will be refunded. \n \n \nWHAT IS ALTERNATE DAYS PLAN? \n \n With Alternate Days Subscription Plan, We will deliver product every other day at your doorstep for the next 30 days. Renewal, Refund and Cancellation is the same as Monthly Subscription Plan \n \n \nWHAT IS CUSTOM DELIVERY PLAN? \n \n With Custom Delivery Plan, Customers can select the days in which the product needs to be delivered and order will be created for product delivery on selected days. \n \n \nHOW DO I MAKE PAYMENT? \n \n You can make payment through Magizhini Wallet or Any mode of Online payment including Credit card, Debit Card and UPI. \n \n \nWHAT HAPPENS WHEN THE SUBSCRIPTION ENDS? \n \n You will have option to either Renew the existing subscription by paying for another 30 days cycle or Unsubscribe any time you wish. \n \n \nHOW CAN I UNSUBSCRIBE AFTER SUBSCRIPTION?? \n \n You can manage all your current subscriptions in Subscription History Tab. From that page you can unsubscribe to any of your active subscriptions. \n \n \nWILL MY MONEY BE REFUNDED AFTER UNSUBSCRIBING? \n \n There is NO ADDITIONAL FEE for cancellation. The total amount balance of the number of days till the end of the current cycle and the number of days deliveries are cancelled will be calculated and will be added to Magizhini Wallet in 4 to 5 Business days. \n \n \nCAN I CANCEL PRODUCT DELIVERY ON CERTAIN DAYS? \n \n As a part of our subscription plan we offer customers the choice to cancel delivery on certain days. The money for all the not delivered days will be REFUNDED back to you once you cancel the subscription plan. \n \n \nARE ALL ITEMS AVAILABLE UNDER SUBSCRIPTION PLAN? \n \n Selected products will only be available for subscription plan. If you specially require a product in our catalogue as a part of subscription plan, You can contact Customer Support regarding your needs and we can arrange the product accordingly. \n\n\n\nPLEASE CONTACT MAGIZINI CUSTOMER SUPPORT FOR ANY FURTHER DETAILS REGARDING SUBSCRIPTION PLANS 591829034624-6s7ca2gpuih8qhf04m8enbc5c1bj0hdu.apps.googleusercontent.com
